title: Application: Markup Details (request)
description: Retrieve details of `app_markup` according to criteria specified.

client_loginid.description: [Optional] Specific client loginid to report on, like CR12345

date_from.description: Start date (epoch or YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS). Results are inclusive of this time.

date_to.description: End date (epoch or YYYY-MM-DD HH::MM::SS). Results are inclusive of this time.

description.description: [Optional] If set to 1, will return `app_markup` transaction details.

limit.description: [Optional] Apply upper limit to count of transactions received.

sort.description: [Optional] Sort direction on `transaction_time`. Other fields sort order is ASC.

sort_fields.description: [Optional] One or more of the specified fields to sort on. Default sort field is by `transaction_time`.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
